```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)

people = read.csv("assets/people.csv")

# Split into staff and PhD students
staff = people |> filter(Position != "PhD student")
phd_students = people |> filter(Position == "PhD student")
```

## Staff

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| results: asis
staff |>
  mutate(link = paste0("- [", Name, "](", Web.page, ")")) |>
  pull(link) |>
  cat(sep = "\n")
```

## PhD students

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| results: asis
phd_students |>
  mutate(link = paste0("- [", Name, "](", Web.page, ")")) |>
  pull(link) |>
  cat(sep = "\n")
```
